name: Update 9
description: Lmao the ShlinkedIn Premium Update broke the bot.
I took advantage of this time to add some features to the profile command
1. Fixed Shlinkbot crashing on reading profile pages with different layouts (aka premium)
2. profile command now displays profile badges: premium, moderator, verified
3. profile command now displays soundtracks if use is premium

name: Update 8
description: 1. Fixed force updating info in leaderboards!
2. Timestamp for last updated now updated with dynamic times

name: Update 7
description: 1. Previous update wasn't fully working, whoops!
3. New optional argument to update leaderboards and profiles!
+  Example use: ".p hans true" (default is false)
4. Profiles and leaderboards now show when they were last updated!
5. Added links to each profile on the leaderboard!

name: Update 6
description: 1. Added caching to leaderboard for faster loading!

name: Update 5
description: Caching for profiles! No, not cash. Not Shlinkpoints either.
2. Probably also made it messier adding #3
3. Added caching to user profiles for faster loading!
+  Caching is now configurable, default set to 24 hours
4. Profile usernames are now shown in the profile command

name: Update 4
description: 3. Most commands now have a random quip as a response!
4. Config now hosts list of random quips.

name: Update 3
description: I finally decided to add some more features:
1. Add Career progression to profile command.
2. Add 3 buttons to profile command to 'Send SP', 'Give Review', and 'Give Endorsement'.
3. Added changelog command because it's good practice and so people can see what's new (i guess).```

name: Update 0.0.2
description: Quick bug fix to support externally hosted profile pictures. Darn you Jack Evangelizer!!!```
